    > 1) using junit can we test load test, system testing
    > etc....

It's possible, although many times not advisable because there are other
tools that work better.  There is a JUnitPerf which I am told will help in
this regards (I have never used it).

    > 2) can we use junit for integrating testing

Not sure what you mean... most likely yes.  Clarify please.

-Jason
